response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features that can significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and versatility, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. Given its unique benefits and the value it can bring to you, I am extending this exclusive offer at a special price of $18,000. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of functionality and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this opportunity.", "product_price": 18000}
